transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Himanshu: Haan ji. 
Customer: Haan Kalpesh sir Himanshu baat kar raha hu business manager Indiamart.com se kaise hai?
Himanshu: Haan ji shuruwat theek hai badhiya. 
Customer: Ji ji aapka call aaya tha hamare customer care pe regarding the TDS amount right?
Customer: Ji ji.
Himanshu: Ji to aapne TDS file kar diya hai?
Customer: Haan ji March mahine mein. 
Himanshu: Okay. Ji ji. 
Customer: March mahine ka hai. 
Himanshu: March mahine ka na to ye aapne jo last payment kiya tha December wala uska hai ya fir kaunsa wohi jo last year kiya tha. 
Customer: January January mein payment hua hoga. 
Himanshu: Nahi nahi December mein hua tha 20 December 2024 ko. 
Customer: Achcha haan to wohi wala hai. 
Himanshu: Hmm? Wohi wala hai wohi. 
Customer: Aapne kaunsa MDC karwaya tha na ek saal ka. 
Customer: Hmm ye to mere ko nahi idea amount bhi pata nahi bill number pata nahi. 
Himanshu: Theek hai. Ah kitne amount ka hai sir TDS?
Customer: ₹900. 
Himanshu: 900 ka na aap mujhe wo jo form hota hai kaunsa 13 form hai na sir?
Customer: Haan. 
Himanshu: Haan jo TDS wala wo mujhe aap dekho maine aapko WhatsApp kiya hai. 
Customer: Ji. 
Himanshu: Theek hai? Haan achcha hello sir likh ke maine message kiya hai Himanshu theek hai aap mujhe wo form de dijiye aur ek cancel check dijiye within a week aapka paisa refund ho jayega. 
Customer: Achcha theek hai okay. 
Himanshu: Ji to aap accountant matlab matlab aapka number registered nahi tha India mart pe right?
Customer: Haan wo number sir ka hoga. 
Himanshu: Haan achcha account team se baat kar rahe hai aap? 
Customer: Ji. 
Himanshu: Achcha theek hai to aap mujhe apne number se maine WhatsApp kar diya aapko aap mujhe form 16 jo aapka TDS ka form hai wo provide kar dijiye jisme aapko deduction hai aur ek cancel check de dijiye. 
Himanshu: To us account mein aapka refund ho jayega within seven days ke andar sir. 
Customer: Okay okay theek hai. 
Himanshu: Theek hai? Okay sir aap bhi koi bhi number mera wo personal number hai wo aap save kar lijiye theek hai aur is number ko usi number ko save kar lijiyega aapka saat din ke andar nahi aata to aap mujhe WhatsApp kar sakte hai ya fir call kar lijiyega usi number pe. 
Customer: Theek hai. 
Himanshu: Theek hai abhi concern ko main close kar deta hu sir theek hai ye to abhi time lagna hai saat se 10 din jo bhi hai aap feedback de dijiyega aur services wagera aap dekhte hai kaun dekhta hai aap dekhte hai. 
Customer: Nahi wo sir service sir hi dekhenge. 
Himanshu: Chaliye theek hai to aap na feedback de dijiyega call ka aapka seven to eight days mein refund aa jayega sir theek hai. 
Customer: Theek hai. 
Himanshu: Okay sir thank you. 
Customer: Okay thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer enquired about TDS refund status.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the refund process.

- Executive requested form 16 and cancelled check.

- Executive assured refund within 7-10 days.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to provide requested documents.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- tds, refund, form 16, cancelled check
